subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Guhil-Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बापा रावल गुहिल-सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following empires was established by Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश द्वारा किस साम्राज्य की स्थापना की गई थी?
explanation_en: The Gurjara-Pratihar Empire was established by the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: प्रतिहार वंश द्वारा गुर्जर-प्रतिहार साम्राज्य की स्थापना की गई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chaulukya dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mularaja was the founder of the Chaulukya dynasty.
explanation_hi: मुलाराजा चौहान वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following battles was fought between Maharana Pratap and Akbar?
question_hi: महाराणा प्रताप और अकबर के बीच लड़ी गई लड़ाई कौन सी थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Maharana Pratap and Akbar.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप और अकबर के बीच हाल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the last ruler of the Gurjara-Pratihar Empire?
question_hi: गुर्जर-प्रतिहार साम्राज्य के अंतिम शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rajyapala was the last ruler of the Gurjara-Pratihar Empire.
explanation_hi: गुर्जर-प्रतिहार साम्राज्य के अंतिम शासक राज्यपाल थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous king of the Chaulukya dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Mularaja was the famous king of the Chaulukya dynasty.
explanation_hi: मुलाराजा चौहान वंश के प्रसिद्ध शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following kingdoms was known as the 'Hill Kingdom'?
question_hi: जिस राज्य को 'हिल किंगडम' कहा जाता था, वह कौन सा था?
explanation_en: The Mewar Kingdom was known as the 'Hill Kingdom'.
explanation_hi: मेवाड़ राज्य को 'हिल किंगडम' कहा जाता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the famous queen of the Chaulukya dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी कौन थी?
explanation_en: Durlabha was the famous queen of the Chaulukya dynasty.
explanation_hi: दुर्लभा चौहान वंश की प्रसिद्ध रानी थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the ruler of the Gurjara-Pratihar Empire during the reign of Indra IV?
question_hi: इंद्र IV के शासनकाल में गुर्जर-प्रतिहार साम्राज्य के शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rajyapala was the ruler of the Gurjara-Pratihar Empire during the reign of Indra IV.
explanation_hi: इंद्र IV के शासनकाल में गुर्जर-प्रतिहार साम्राज्य के शासक राज्यपाल थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following empires was established by the Chaulukya dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश द्वारा किस साम्राज्य की स्थापना की गई थी?
explanation_en: The Chaulukya Empire was established by the Chaulukya dynasty.
explanation_hi: चौहान वंश द्वारा चौहान साम्राज्य की स्थापना की गई थी।
